statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Quan Jackson hit three 3-pointers down the stretch and scored 26 points to help Georgia Southern hold off Louisiana-Monroe, 67-65 on Thursday night.
article.headline: Georgia Southern holds off Louisiana-Monroe late, wins 67-65
article.linkText: Georgia Southern holds off Louisiana-Monroe late, wins 67-65
article.story: MONROE, La. -- Quan Jackson hit three 3-pointers down the stretch and scored 26 points to help Georgia Southern hold off Louisiana-Monroe, 67-65 on Thursday night. Josh Nicholas got off a shot from mid-court that was a touch too strong as time expired for the Warhawks, who cut a 15-point deficit down a field goal in the closing seconds. ULM's losing streak now stands at nine straight. Jackson scored 20 of his points in the second half for the Eagles (14-10, 8-5 Sun Belt) and topped the 20-point mark for the third straight game. Ike Smith added 15 points, Simeon Carter had 13 points and grabbed nine rebounds and Isaiah Crawley contributed 10 points. Michael Ertel finished with 30 points to lead ULM (6-16, 2-11) and sparked the Warhawks' second-half comeback by scoring 10 points in a 12-0 run that cut the lead to 52-47 with 8:04 to play. Erie Olonade added 11 points and eight rebounds off the bench and Tyree White added 10. Georgia Southern plays at Louisiana-Lafayette Saturday night. ULM plays host to Georgia State Saturday afternoon.
